title: Covid-19 positivity drops below 2 percent: NCOC
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 26 (APP): The national Covid-19 positivity ratio on Saturday has dropped below 2% where 935 people testing positive and 1,110 people recovering from the deadly disease.
There were 46,842 tests were carried out across the country, said the National Command and Operation Centre (NCOC) in a tweet.
Statistics 26 June 21: Total Tests in Last 24  Hours: 46,842Positive Cases:  935Positivity % : 1.99%Deaths : 36
â€” NCOC (@OfficialNcoc) June 26, 2021
The national Covid-19 positivity was recorded 1.99% where 36 people died across the country due to deadly virus.
